intro.cardAbs: The first step in finding a career direction is planning. Effective career planning involves self-exploration, understanding the career environment, and staying informed about workplace trends and skills development. By exploring and learning in these areas, individuals can open up endless possibilities for their future.
intro.superFiveDevelopmentStages:
Super Five Development
Stages and Rainbow Chart
intro.postModernPositivePsychologyTheory:
Post-modern Positive Psychology
Theory of Focus Problem Solving
intro.superFiveDevelopmentStagesDesc:
The rainbow symbolizes life’s journey, reflecting our many roles and the five key
stages of human development.
intro.focusProblemSolvingTheoryDesc:
Supporting participants in developing goals, confidence, and hope to foster
positive thinking and action, creating limitless possibilities.
intro.swainCareerPlanningTriangleDesc:
Career decisions should consider three dimensions: self,
career environment, and career information.
intro.aboutUsContent: The “Infinity Cards” were co-created by a team of experienced psychologists, career development professionals, and computer engineers specializing in career assessment systems. Grounded in career counseling theories, Holland’s Career Interest Theory, Super’s Five Development Stages and Career Rainbow, Swain’s Career Planning Golden Triangle, and postmodern positive psychology and solution-focused counseling, the cards are designed to inspire users’ curiosity about themselves and enthusiasm for exploring career information, leading them on a journey of self-discovery and life’s unexpected possibilities.

playground.NeedToCompletePreviousStage: Please complete the previous stage first
playground.GoalSelectDescriptionStage1: • Next, 100 careers types will be displayed on the screen. Please select the careers you like, aspire to, and have a passion for in the future based on your personal judgment and feelings.
playground.GoalSelectDescriptionStage2: • From the #remainingCards# careers you previously selected as "liked", up to 10 will be displayed on the screen. Please choose up to 10 careers that you would really like to pursue in the future.
playground.GoalSelectDescriptionStage3: • From the #remainingCards# careers you previously selected as "would really like to pursue in the future", up to #remainingCards# will be displayed on the screen. Please choose up to 3 careers that you most want to do in the future.
playground.errorGoalKeepCardsNum: Please keep up to #warningCount# cards. You currently have #keepCardsNum# cards selected, and you must keep at least 2 cards.
playground.PickupCardRuleGoal: • Please in 8 minutes, click the career card to flip the card face up or down, the front represents the career card you leave selected.
playground.PickupCardRuleFinish: • Finally, press the "Finish" button to end this stage of the exam.
playground.CareSelectDescription: • Next, 60 traits will be displayed on the screen. Please select the traits you value most based on your personal judgment and feelings. Please choose based on your first instinct.
playground.PickupCardRuleCare: • Please in 8 minutes, click the trait card to flip the card face up or down, the front represents the trait you leave selected.
playground.LikeSelectDescription: • Next, 60 things you like to do will be displayed on the screen. Please select the things you like to do based on your personal judgment and feelings. Please choose based on your first instinct.
playground.PickupCardRuleLike: • Please in 8 minutes, click the thing card to flip the card face up or down, the front represents the thing you leave selected.
playground.CanSelectDescription: • Next, 60 things you can do will be displayed on the screen. Please select the things you can do based on your personal judgment and feelings. Please choose based on your first instinct.
playground.PickupCardRuleCan: • Please in 8 minutes, click the thing card to flip the card face up or down, the front represents the thing you leave selected.
playground.pairFinishSuccess: You have successfully completed card selection.
playground.pairRollbackSuccess: You have successfully rolled back the previous action.
playground.playgroundTimeOver: Time's up! Please confirm if you want to continue?
